catalog_metadata.name: Multi Cloud - MEAN Stack deployment
catalog_metadata.description: This service deploy MEAN stock on your choice of cloud.

bullets.title: Clouds
bullets.description:
Vmware vSphere
IBM Cloud/Softlayer
Amazon EC2
Microsoft Azure

bullets.title: Stack
bullets.description:
1. MongoDB:	a NoSQL database
2. Express.js:	a web application framework that runs on Node.js
3. Angular.js:	a JavaScript MVC framework that runs in br

bullets.title: Operating systems supported
bullets.description:
AWS: Ubuntu 16.04
IBM Cloud: CentOS 7
Microsoft Azure: Ubuntu 16.04
VMWare: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 7

bullets.title: Usage and special notes
bullets.description:
1. Downloads latest releases of software.
2. Deployment takes approximately 10 minutes to complete.
3. To access the application and virtual machines,

catalog_metadata.longDescription:
Deploys a hybrid cloud MEAN stack (Mongo, Express, Angular, Node) on your choice of cloud.
This deployment also deploys a simple sample application to validate the stack is operational.
catalog_metadata.author: admin

actions.name: Provision
actions.description: Default action for deployment of service

input_parameters.name: HybridCloud
input_parameters.label: Hybrid Cloud
input_parameters.description: Selete the cloud to deploy MEAN stack

input_parameters.name: mongodb_vm_image
input_parameters.label: VM template
input_parameters.description: VC VM template to deploy vm

input_parameters.name: mongodb_vm_root_disk_size
input_parameters.label: Mongo root disk side
input_parameters.description: root disk size for mongo vm

input_parameters.name: mongodb_vm_name
input_parameters.label: VM display name
input_parameters.description: VM display name for mongo VM

input_parameters.name: mongodb_vm_root_disk_datastore
input_parameters.label: Data Store
input_parameters.description: Data Store to place VM files, like vmx, vmdk etc...

input_parameters.name: vm_folder
input_parameters.label: VC Folder
input_parameters.description: VC Folder to keep the VMs

input_parameters.name: nodejs_vm_name
input_parameters.label: NodeJS VM display Name
input_parameters.description: VC display name for nodejs VM

input_parameters.name: network_name_prefix
input_parameters.label: AWS Network prefix
input_parameters.description: The prefix of names for VPC, Gateway, Subnet and Security Group; Allow 1 to 240 alphanumeric characters and special characters +=._:/@- as tag value that is not starting with aws

input_parameters.name: hostname-db
input_parameters.label: DB Hostname
input_parameters.description: The hostname of server with mongo; Allow 1 to 200 alphanumeric characters and non-consecutive non-leading non-ending dashes

input_parameters.name: hostname-nodejs
input_parameters.label: NodeJS hostname
input_parameters.description: The hostname of server with nodejs; Allow 1 to 255 alphanumeric characters and special characters +=._:/@- as tag value that is not starting with aws

input_parameters.name: aws_image
input_parameters.label: AWS Operating System ID
input_parameters.description: Operating system image id / template that should be used when creating the virtual image

input_parameters.name: aws_ami_owner_id
input_parameters.label: AWS AMI Owner ID
input_parameters.description: AWS AMI Owner ID for IBM Cloud

input_parameters.name: Azure-name_prefix
input_parameters.label: Azure Prefix of Resource Names
input_parameters.description: Prefix of names for Azure resources; The name prefix must be 1-52 alphanumeric characters and dash

input_parameters.name: admin_user
input_parameters.label: Admin User to Access Virtual Machines
input_parameters.description: Name of an administrative user to be created in all virtual machines in this deployment; The user name must be 1-32 alphanumeric (with beginning at letters) and special characters including -._

input_parameters.name: admin_user_password
input_parameters.label: Admin User to Access Virtual Machines
input_parameters.description: Password of the newly created administrative user; The supplied password must be between 6-72 characters long and must satisfy at least 3 of password complexity requirements from the following: 1) Contains an uppercase character; 2) Contains a lowercase character; 3) Contains a numeric digit; 4) Contains a special character
